abstract: Gary Lincoff is the author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms.''
snippet: Gary Lincoff is the author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms.''
lead_paragraph: This week, Gary Lincoff - author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms," past president of the North American Mycological Association, and instructor at the New York Botanical Garden - is visiting City Room, to field your questions about local fungi. Submit your questions on City Room.

headline.main: A Mushroom Expert Will Answer Your Questions
